title: Opéra-comique during the French Revolution: An archival and institutional study
abstractText: This project constitutes the first ever scholarly study of the Theatre de l'Opera - Comique during the French Revolution (1789-1799). Based on archival sources from the theatre itself and from the various state organs responsible for the policing of theatre during a various phases of the Revolution, the study combines an analysis of the workings of the institution, and the means by which the state attempted to control it.
